alert.note: Alert for San Miguel (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 6:54PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following county, San Miguel. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 651 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Placerville and Fall Creek. This includes areas along Highway 145 from mile markers 81 to 94 and Highway 62 from mile markers 1 to 5.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
